lines.text:
[screaming at Jim]
Give me back my pants!

[to Jim]
One minute I want to kill you and the next minute I want to kiss you and... kiss you and... kiss you.
Is this a collision course I'm flying?
Drop your dive brakes. You're right on top of it.

[When asked why a fellow Russian has ejected from an aircraft sitting on the runway]
He must have pulled the seat ejection lever instead of the seat adjustment lever!

[At the Vienna restaurant, Anna leans in to kiss Jum]
Wipe your chin!
[She does, and they kiss, as the scene fades to mark the end of the film]
Have you had many of them?
